segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, stretching to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s so close to falling, and the stool looks like it’s about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently, her hand outstretched for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re both going to get into trouble if the woman turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing so precariously, and the floor is wet—this is dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before and gotten away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely oblivious, just drying that same plate over and over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at the girl’s hopeful expression, though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn’t fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
